short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CodingKaro is an all-in-one extension for coding enthusiasts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing CodingKaro – Your Ultimate Coding Contest Companion!

Explore coding contests effortlessly across more than 10 premier platforms like CodeChef, CodeForces, LeetCode, Kaggle, Toph, AtCoder, Geeks for Geeks, CodeTStudio, and more. CodingKaro is not just an extension; it's your personal coding concierge, ensuring you never miss out on any coding contest action.

Key Features:

Multi-Platform Contest Tracking: Stay ahead by seamlessly monitoring coding contests from over 10 renowned sites, all from one centralized hub – CodingKaro.

Smart Reminders on Multiple Devices: Set reminders effortlessly on Google Calendar and receive notifications on your PC, ensuring you're always prepared for the next coding challenge.

Mobile App Integration: Extend the power of CodingKaro to your mobile device with the companion app. Carry your coding contests wherever you go for uninterrupted coding excellence.

Upcoming Features for Career Growth: Stay tuned for upcoming features like job and internship updates, automatic reminders, and much more – making CodingKaro your holistic coding companion.

What's New?

One-Click Contest Access: Dive into coding contests with a single click, streamlining your contest participation process for a seamless experience.

Google Calendar Integration: Add contests to your schedule effortlessly, utilizing Google Calendar's robust features to manage your coding journey efficiently.

Smart Alarms for Precision: Set alarms to open contest links one minute before the start, ensuring you're at the forefront of every competition.

Tailored Updates: Choose specific websites for updates, customizing your experience to receive notifications only from your preferred coding platforms.

Key Features of CodingKaro:

Effortless Contest Access: Click on the contest name and instantly immerse yourself in the coding challenge.

Timely Contest Reminders: Receive reminders five minutes before each contest with a simple click on the bell icon, ensuring you're always prepared.

Seamless Schedule Management: Add contests to your schedule effortlessly, keeping your coding journey organized and stress-free.

Tailored Platform Updates: Customize your experience by receiving updates only for contests on your chosen coding platforms.

Access to Top Programming Platforms: Explore contests from all popular programming platforms, expanding your coding horizons.

Intuitive Contest Filtering: Filter contests by timeframe, including live contests, those within 24 hours, upcoming challenges, and ongoing live events.

Sites Supported:

CodingKaro supports almost all top coding contest websites, providing you with a comprehensive coding contest management solution.

Don't let coding opportunities slip away! Embrace the future of coding contest management with CodingKaro. Join our community of coding enthusiasts who are already harnessing the power of this game-changing Chrome extension. Get ready to code, conquer, and celebrate victory – all with your trusty buddy, CodingKaro!
